languages.text: "Пересечь два сектора не так уж легко, особенно для простого гражданина, пусть и располагающего кое-какими ресурсами... Я менял корабль за кораблем, иногда вынужден был подолгу ждать на мирах-пересадках, ожидая судна, летящего в нужном мне направлении, или окончания волнений {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}. Всего у меня на дорогу ушло сто семь лет. По времени {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реального мира{/g}, конечно. Для меня прошло куда меньше, примерно тридцать — тридцать пять. И вот, спустя эти долгие годы, потратив все сбережения, я добрался до своей мечты..."

"It is no easy feat to cross two sectors, especially for a common citizen, albeit one who has some resources at his disposal... I had to change one ship after another, at times being forced to stay on transfer worlds waiting for a vessel headed in the right direction or for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances to subside. The voyage took me a total of one hundred and seven years. In {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time, of course. For me it was much less than that, somewhere in the neighbourhood of thirty or thirty-five. And then, after all those years, having spent all of my savings, I reached my dream..."
languages.original_text: "Пересечь два сектора не так уж легко, особенно для простого гражданина, пусть и располагающего кое-какими ресурсами... Я менял корабль за кораблем, иногда вынужден был подолгу ждать на мирах-пересадках, ожидая судна, летящего в нужном мне направлении, или окончания волнений {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}. И вот, спустя эти долгие годы, потратив все сбережения, я добрался до своей мечты..."

traits.locale_text: "It is no easy feat to cross two sectors, especially for a common citizen, albeit one who has some resources at his disposal... I was changing one ship after another, at times being forced to stay on transfer worlds waiting for a vessel headed in the right direction or for warp disturbances to subside. The voyage took me a total of one hundred and seven years. In realspace time, of course. For me it was much less than that, somewhere in the neighbourhood of thirty or thirty-five. And then, after all those years, having spent all of my savings, I reached my dream..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

For me it was much less than that, somewhere in the neighbourhood of thirty or thirty-five. And then, after all those years, having spent all of my savings, I reached my dream..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: 「多少の資金はあるとはいえ、一般市民がふたつの星域を移動するのは難しいです…私は次々と船を乗り換えなければならず、正しい方向に向かう船や{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}の乱れが収まるのを待つために転送途中の惑星に留まらざるを得ないこともありました。合計107年もの時間を旅に費やしました。もちろん、{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}時間です。体感はもっと少なく、30年から35年ほど旅をした気分です。そして長い年月を経て、貯金をすべて使い果たし、とうとう夢にたどり着きました…」
languages.original_text: "It is no easy feat to cross two sectors, especially for a common citizen, albeit one who has some resources at his disposal... I had to change one ship after another, at times being forced to stay on transfer worlds waiting for a vessel headed in the right direction or for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances to subside. The voyage took me a total of one hundred and seven years. In {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time, of course. For me it was much less than that, somewhere in the neighbourhood of thirty or thirty-five. And then, after all those years, having spent all of my savings, I reached my dream..."

traits.locale_text: 「多少の資金はあるとはいえ、一般市民がふたつの星域を移動するのは難しいです…私は次々と船を乗り換えなければならず、正しい方向に向かう船や{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}の乱れが収まるのを待つために転送途中の惑星に留まらざるを得ないこともありました。合計107年もの時間を旅に費やしました。もちろん、{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}時間です。体感はもっと少なく、30年から35年ほど旅をした気分です。そして長い年月を経て、貯金をすべて使い果たし、とうとう夢にたどり着きました…」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: “跨越两个星区绝非易事，对普通公民而言更是如此，即便是拥有一定积蓄的公民也不例外……我不得不一直换乘飞船，一艘接着一艘。有的时候，我会被迫滞留在中转世界上，等待前往目标方向的飞船，或是等待{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的干扰消退。这场航行一共耗去了我一百零七年的时间。当然，这是以{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}的时间计算的。对我而言，我的感觉比这要短得多，或许只有三十到三十五年左右。到了最后，这么多年过去了，我花光了所有的积蓄，终于实现了我的梦想……”
languages.original_text: "It is no easy feat to cross two sectors, especially for a common citizen, albeit one who has some resources at his disposal... I had to change one ship after another, at times being forced to stay on transfer worlds waiting for a vessel headed in the right direction or for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances to subside. The voyage took me a total of one hundred and seven years. In {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time, of course. For me it was much less than that, somewhere in the neighbourhood of thirty or thirty-five. And then, after all those years, having spent all of my savings, I reached my dream..."

traits.locale_text: “跨越两个星区绝非易事，对普通公民而言更是如此，即便是拥有一定积蓄的公民也不例外……我不得不一直换乘飞船，一艘接着一艘。有的时候，我会被迫滞留在中转世界上，等待前往目标方向的飞船，或是等待{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的干扰消退。这场航行一共耗去了我一百零七年的时间。当然，这是以{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}的时间计算的。对我而言，我的感觉比这要短得多，或许只有三十到三十五年左右。到了最后，这么多年过去了，我花光了所有的积蓄，终于实现了我的梦想……”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: «Cruzar dos sectores no es tarea fácil, sobre todo para un ciudadano de a pie, por muchos recursos que cuente en su haber... Tuve que cambiar de nave una y otra vez, en ocasiones incluso esperar en mundos de tránsito al vehículo que me llevaría en la dirección adecuada o a que pasaran las distorsiones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Tardé ciento siete años en finalizar mi viaje. En tiempo del {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}, por supuesto. Aunque para mí fueron muchos menos, alrededor de treinta o treinta y cinco. Y ahora, después de tantos años y de haber gastado todos mis ahorros, he cumplido mi sueño».
languages.original_text: "It is no easy feat to cross two sectors, especially for a common citizen, albeit one who has some resources at his disposal... I had to change one ship after another, at times being forced to stay on transfer worlds waiting for a vessel headed in the right direction or for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances to subside. The voyage took me a total of one hundred and seven years. In {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time, of course. For me it was much less than that, somewhere in the neighbourhood of thirty or thirty-five. And then, after all those years, having spent all of my savings, I reached my dream..."

traits.locale_text: «Cruzar dos sectores no es tarea fácil, sobre todo para un ciudadano de a pie, por muchos recursos que cuente en su haber... Tuve que cambiar de nave una y otra vez, en ocasiones incluso esperar en mundos de tránsito al vehículo que me llevaría en la dirección adecuada o a que pasaran las distorsiones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Tardé ciento siete años en finalizar mi viaje. En tiempo del {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}, por supuesto. Aunque para mí fueron muchos menos, alrededor de treinta o treinta y cinco. Y ahora, después de tantos años y de haber gastado todos mis ahorros, he cumplido mi sueño».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: « Il est bien difficile de traverser deux secteurs pour un citoyen ordinaire, même s'il a des ressources à sa disposition. J'ai dû changer plusieurs fois de vaisseau, en étant parfois contraint de séjourner sur des mondes transitoires jusqu'à ce que je trouve un vaisseau allant dans la bonne direction, ou en attendant les perturbations du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} se dissipent. Au total, ce voyage m'a pris cent sept ans... en années de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}, bien entendu. Pour moi, ce fut beaucoup moins que cela, disons entre trente et trente-cinq ans. Et enfin, après avoir dilapidé toutes mes économies, j'ai atteint l'objectif dont je rêvais tant... »
languages.original_text: "It is no easy feat to cross two sectors, especially for a common citizen, albeit one who has some resources at his disposal... I had to change one ship after another, at times being forced to stay on transfer worlds waiting for a vessel headed in the right direction or for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances to subside. The voyage took me a total of one hundred and seven years. In {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time, of course. For me it was much less than that, somewhere in the neighbourhood of thirty or thirty-five. And then, after all those years, having spent all of my savings, I reached my dream..."

traits.locale_text: « Il est bien difficile de traverser deux secteurs pour un citoyen ordinaire, même s'il a des ressources à sa disposition. J'ai dû changer plusieurs fois de vaisseau, en étant parfois contraint de séjourner sur des mondes transitoires jusqu'à ce que je trouve un vaisseau allant dans la bonne direction, ou en attendant les perturbations du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} se dissipent. Au total, ce voyage m'a pris cent sept ans... en années de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g}, bien entendu. Pour moi, ce fut beaucoup moins que cela, disons entre trente et trente-cinq ans. Et enfin, après avoir dilapidé toutes mes économies, j'ai atteint l'objectif dont je rêvais tant... »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: "Es ist keine leichte Aufgabe, zwei Sektoren zu überwinden, zumal für einen gewöhnlichen Bürger, auch wenn er einige Ressourcen zur Verfügung hat ... Ich stieg von einem Schiff ins nächste um, musste manchmal auf Transferwelten warten, bis es in die richtige Richtung weiterging oder die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Störungen nachließen. Insgesamt dauerte meine Reise einhundertundsieben Jahre. In {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g}-Zeit, versteht sich. Für mich war es viel weniger, etwa dreißig oder fünfunddreißig. Und dann erreichte ich nach all den Jahren, mein ganzes Geld war ausgegeben, meinen Traum ..."
languages.original_text: "It is no easy feat to cross two sectors, especially for a common citizen, albeit one who has some resources at his disposal... I had to change one ship after another, at times being forced to stay on transfer worlds waiting for a vessel headed in the right direction or for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances to subside. The voyage took me a total of one hundred and seven years. In {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time, of course. For me it was much less than that, somewhere in the neighbourhood of thirty or thirty-five. And then, after all those years, having spent all of my savings, I reached my dream..."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist keine leichte Aufgabe, zwei Sektoren zu überwinden, zumal für einen gewöhnlichen Bürger, auch wenn er einige Ressourcen zur Verfügung hat ... Ich stieg von einem Schiff ins nächste um, musste manchmal auf Transferwelten warten, bis es in die richtige Richtung weiterging oder die {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Störungen nachließen. Insgesamt dauerte meine Reise einhundertundsieben Jahre. In {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g}-Zeit, versteht sich. Für mich war es viel weniger, etwa dreißig oder fünfunddreißig. Und dann erreichte ich nach all den Jahren, mein ganzes Geld war ausgegeben, meinen Traum ..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: "İki koca sektörü geçmek kolay iş değil, hele bir de sıradan vatandaşsan. Elde az buçuk kaynağım olsa bile... Sürekli gemi değiştirmek zorunda kaldım. Zaman zaman doğru yöne gidecek bir vasıta çıksın veya {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} bozunumları dinsin diye aktarım dünyalarında beklemem gerekti. Bu yolculuk, toplamda yüz yedi yılımı aldı. {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Gerçekuzay{/g} zamanı olarak tabii. Benim için geçen süre bundan çok daha azdı. Otuz veya otuz beş yıl kadar. Nihayet onca yıldan ve tüm birikimimi tükettikten sonra hayalime ulaştım."
languages.original_text: "It is no easy feat to cross two sectors, especially for a common citizen, albeit one who has some resources at his disposal... I had to change one ship after another, at times being forced to stay on transfer worlds waiting for a vessel headed in the right direction or for {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} disturbances to subside. The voyage took me a total of one hundred and seven years. In {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}realspace{/g} time, of course. For me it was much less than that, somewhere in the neighbourhood of thirty or thirty-five. And then, after all those years, having spent all of my savings, I reached my dream..."

traits.locale_text: "İki koca sektörü geçmek kolay iş değil, hele bir de düz bir vatandaş olunca. Elinde birtakım kaynakların olsa bile... Sürekli gemi değiştirmek zorunda kaldım. Zaman zaman doğru yöne gidecek bir vasıta çıksın veya {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} bozunumları azalsın diye aktarma dünyalarında beklemek zorunda kaldım. Bu yolculuk, toplamda yüz yedi yılımı aldı. Bu dediğim süre, {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}gerçekuzay{/g} zamanı olarak tabii. Benim için geçen süre bundan çok daha azdı; otuz veya otuz beş yıl civarı diyelim. Nihayet onca yıl geçtikten ve tüm para birikimimi harcadıktan sonra hayalime ulaştım..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian
